content.Introduction: This notice explains what data we collect during gameplay and how we use it.
content.Data we collect:
- Gameplay Data: Maps/gamemodes played, challenges completed, leveling results, poll results, etc .... 
- Device Information: Operating system.
content.Why We Collect Data:
- Improve Gameplay: To enhance game features and user experience. 
- Analytics: To understand what features are liked/disliked.
content.Third-Party Services: We use Google Analytics to gather data, we will never share your data with any third-parties
content.Contact Us: For questions, contact us on our discord
